question: My best friend keeps ghosting me for their new significant other. Do I confront them or just accept our friendship has changed?
description: Navigating friendship changes when a new partner enters the picture.

options.text: Confront them, open communication is vital.
Give them space, they'll come back around.
Find new friends who prioritize you.
